name: Estate of Horrors
description:
A hovercraft-inspired isometric horror-survival game that uses a crafting system to progress through the Manor.

Play as Detective D. sent to inspect a Manor that reports say people have entered and have gone missing. Fight through horrors summoned by occults and craft better gear to escape out alive and report your findings. Can you make it out?

Made By FoxTails Collective (Twitter)

Tanner Deȧk- President and Artist

Ethan Mize - Level Design and World Builder

Alex Rodriguez - Programmer and Writter

Brittany Sams - Artist and Writter
